page.title: 20MOTHER AND TODDLER GROUP
page.content: The aim of the group is to provide a meeting place for mothers with young children .It is a self run organisation where the 40p per family subscription is put into a fund to provide refreshments for everybody.We have various fund-raising activties throughout the year,to buy Toys and equipment and to pay for a Christmas party and summer outing.The equipment that we have at present consists of a large wooden slide, several sit-in-and -ride cars, trikes and bikes, pushchair and dolls, lots of puzzles and books and various other small toys. The group is open to all mothers and children under 5, who live in and around Barrow.
